---
title: "Mountain Classifier (Single)"
description: "This mountain classifier recognizes the Matterhorn, Assiniboine, Mont Blanc, and Titlis. Upload an image to classify your mountain."

format: 
    html:
        css: 'mountain.css'
---

```{=html}
<div id="photo-input"><input id="photo" type="file" /></div>
<div id="results"></div>

<script type="module">
    import { Client } from "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@gradio/client/dist/index.min.js";
    async function read() {
    const client = await Client.connect("sasipimt/mountain");
    const result = await client.predict("/predict", {
        img: photo.files[0],
    });

    const label = result.data[0]["confidences"][0]["label"];
    const conf = result.data[0]["confidences"][0]["confidence"].toFixed(4);
    const imageUrl = URL.createObjectURL(photo.files[0]);
    results.innerHTML = `<br/><img src="${imageUrl}" width="300"> <p> This is <b>${label}<b/></p> <p>Confidence: ${conf}</p>`;
    }
    photo.addEventListener("input", read);
</script>
